prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

LIGHTING: day time - use appropriate day lighting (bright, natural sunlight)

STYLE CONSISTENCY (use reference for style only, NOT content):
- Match the art style, color palette from reference
- Character: same appearance (hair, clothes) but NEW pose for this action
- Do NOT copy or trace the reference image
- Sudden movement.

SCENE:
- Location: The Abandoned Music Room - A dusty, sun-drenched room filled with old instruments covered in white sheets. This is Kai's domain.- Shot: close-up shot focusing on face and expressions
- Angle: low angle looking up, shows power or grandeur

CHARACTERS (draw with correct human anatomy and proportions):
- Character 'Kai' (messy silver-tinted hair, piercing blue ghostly eyes, unbuttoned school blazer, faint blue glow, slight static effect around hands) - Expression: mischievous - Position: left of frame
- Character 'Mina Kim' (short black bob hair, pale skin, large white headphones, oversized beige cardigan, tired dark circles under eyes) - Expression: neutral - Position: center of frame

ACTION: Kai suddenly leans in very close to her ear, his face serious.

FORMAT:
- FULL BLEED: artwork extends to ALL edges, no white borders
- No speech bubbles or text in the image

QUALITY:
- Clean linework, correct anatomy and body proportions
- Expressive faces, dynamic poses
- Professional webtoon art quality

panel_data.action: Kai suddenly leans in very close to her ear, his face serious.
